=Motivation=

Create a new column containing the gene name

==Solution==
use the following java snippet:

[https://knime4bio.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/ExtractGeneName.png]

{{{
String info=$INFO$;
for(String s1:info.split("[;]"))
 {
 if(s1.startsWith("GN=")) return s1.substring(3);
 }
return null;
}}}
